price: 238. Soyez assidus aux Çalâts, et à la Çalât médiane (surtout), et levez-vous devant Allah en toute humilité (pour accomplir la prière).
arabic: حَٰفِظُواْ عَلَى ٱلصَّلَوَٰتِ وَٱلصَّلَوٰةِ ٱلۡوُسۡطَىٰ وَقُومُواْ لِلَّهِ قَٰنِتِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: ḥāfiẓū ʿalā al-ṣalawāti wal-ṣalati al-wus'ṭā waqūmū lillahi qānitīna
